rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area combining dining and sitting space with integrated kitchen layout. Incorporates natural light through large windows and doors following Vastu principles.
Integrated seating arrangement within the living area for communal meals, designed to enhance social interactions.
Open-plan kitchen with modern fixtures, ensuring efficient workflow. Windows placed to allow sunlight and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Main master bedroom adjacent to the living area offering privacy and direct access to garden views.
Guest bedroom ensuring accessibility for joint family members. Designed with built-in storage and a small balcony.
Secondary bedroom, versatile space that can serve as home office or study area, incorporating soundproofing and ergonomic furniture placement according to Vastu.
Dedicated home office with functional layout. Positioned in a quiet corner of the ground floor ensuring minimal distractions while aligning with Vastu principles for prosperity.
En-suite bathroom attached to bedroom 1, featuring modern amenities and natural lighting.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east as per Vastu for auspicious entry. Spacious foyer leading into the living area.
Service entrance and direct access to garden, ensuring ease of movement and privacy.
Large windows on south-facing wall enhancing natural light in the living area while maintaining privacy.
Skylight above the kitchen area for additional ventilation and ambient lighting.
